WorkItem.Description:
1)  Within Rawr as SV hunter
2)  Select MM hunter talents
3)  Rawr crashes
 
*Selecting 'no talents', BM, or other spec does _not_ cause a crash.
 
**Also, importing a 2.3.11 MM Hunter save .xml crashes Rawr on program load.

Comments.Message:
I also ran into this problem, and it seems to be an interaction between enabling the +10% AP buffs and having a point in Trueshot Aura (not sure if this also affects other classes that bring the +10% AP buff)

Disabling the buff for the Hunter and Pet in the XML file should allow it to work, or disabling the talent point.

Thanks for the Reply,

I was able to reproduce this.

If I remove the Trueshot aura buff from my both myself and my pet, Rawr will no longer crash upon selecting MM.  (with 1 pt in the TSA talent)

This is still a relatively serious flaw however.  If you are specced in SV, but have TSA listed as a buff, and then try to use the Optimizer with talents selected, Rawr will crash.
Don't use Talents in with the Optimizer in Hunter, period.

Is this going live in the 2.3.13 version?  I had the same issue out of the blue on my hunter last night.    My hunter (and only the hunter) crashed within 30 secs or so fo use or if I started to optimise.  It took me a couple of goes to turn the True-Shot Aura buff for myself and pet (due to crashes) but since then everything has worked fine again.

Thanks
